attributes.action: first port property management company to account for grossly overcharging
attributes.background: Charging for services that they do not provide ,and not providing details of services when asked for by tennants

rejection.details:
The courts, not the UK Parliament and Government, are responsible for settling disputes between leaseholders and management companies. 

You can find out more about applying to the First-Tier Tribunal (Property Chamber - Residential Property) and dealing with disputes here:

https://www.gov.uk/leasehold-property/leasehold-disputes
